TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataSourceView extends System.Object

summary.span: 用作所有数据源视图类的基类，这些视图类定义数据源控件的功能。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all data source view classes, which define the capabilities of data source controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够以一致的方式绑定到数据。ASP.NET supports a data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. Web 服务器控件绑定到数据的数据绑定控件，并促进绑定称为数据源控件的类称为。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任何数据源： 关系数据库、 文件、 流、 业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件数据绑定控件，而不考虑源或基础数据的格式一致的方式呈现数据。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 提供的数据源控件使用 ASP.NET，包括， ，和，若要执行大多数 Web 开发任务。You use the data source controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks. 使用基和类时您想要实现自定义数据源控件。You use the base and classes when you want to implement your own custom data source control. 您可以将数据源控件的组合视为对象和其关联的数据的列表，名为数据源视图。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated lists of data, called data source views. 表示数据的每个列表对象。Each list of data is represented by a object. 类是基类的所有数据源视图或与数据源控件相关联的数据的列表。The class is the base class for all data source views, or lists of data, associated with data source controls. 数据源视图定义的数据源控件的功能。Data source views define the capabilities of a data source control. 由于基础数据存储包含一个或多个列表的数据，数据源控件始终是与一个或多个已命名的数据源视图相关联的。Because the underlying data storage contains one or more lists of data, a data source control is always associated with one or more named data source views. 使用数据源控件方法来枚举数据源当前与数据源控件关联的视图和方法来按名称检索特定数据源视图实例。The data source control uses the method to enumerate the data source views currently associated with the data source control and the method to retrieve a specific data source view instance by name. 所有对象支持从基础数据源使用的数据检索方法。All objects support data retrieval from the underlying data source using the method. 所有视图选择性地都支持一组基本的操作，包括操作，如， ，和。All views optionally support a basic set of operations, including operations such as , , and . 数据绑定控件可以使用通过检索关联的数据源的数据源控件的功能查看发现和方法，并通过在设计时或运行的时查询视图。A data-bound control can discover the capabilities of a data source control by retrieving an associated data source view using the and methods, and by querying the view at design time or run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类来创建数据源控件的强类型的视图类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a strongly typed view class for a data source control. `CsVDataSourceView`类定义的功能`CsvDataSource`数据源控件，并提供一个实现，使用逗号分隔值 (.csv) 文件中存储数据的数据绑定控件。The `CsVDataSourceView` class defines the capabilities of the `CsvDataSource` data source control and provides an implementation for data-bound controls to use data stored in comma-separated value (.csv) files. 有关详细信息`CsvDataSource`数据源控件，请参阅类。For more information on the `CsvDataSource` data source control, see the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 对象关联的 对象是否支持 操作。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object associated with the current object supports the operation.

value.span: 如果支持该操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is supported; otherwise, .
The base class implementation returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性反映了不仅功能的数据源控件，而且还是否适合当前执行的操作。The property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation. 例如，即使数据源视图支持通常，如果未设置必需的属性或某些其他数据，操作属性返回`false`，因为删除操作会失败。For example, even though a data source view supports the operation in general, if a required property or some other data is not set, the property returns `false`, as a delete operation would fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性和方法中的类来扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property and the method in a class that extends the class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性反映了不仅功能的数据源控件，而且还是否适合当前执行的操作。The property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation. 例如，即使数据源控件支持操作，但如果必需的插入命令或未设置某些其他数据，则属性返回`false`，因为插入操作会失败。For example, even though a data source control supports the operation, if a required insert command or some other data is not set, the property returns `false`, as an insert operation would fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写属性和方法中的类来扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property and the method in a class that extends the class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object associated with the current object supports paging through the data retrieved by the method.

value.span: 如果支持该操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is supported; otherwise, .
The base class implementation returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件可以通过添加请求分页字段对象传递给方法。A data-bound control can request paging by adding the field to the object passed to the method. 如果数据绑定控件请求进行分页，但属性返回`false`，数据源视图将引发异常。If a data-bound control requests paging, but the property returns `false`, the data source view throws an exception.

summary.span: 在数据源视图更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the data source view has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对数据源视图的更改可能是由于中的其属性，或通过数据源视图中执行的数据操作而导致的数据更改的值的更改。The change to the data source view could be due to a change in the values of its properties, or to a change in the data due to a data operation performed by the data source view. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

param.span: 用于在异步操作完成时通知数据绑定控件的 委托。

span.span: A delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.

summary.span: 对 对象所表示的数据列表执行异步删除操作。

span.span: Performs an asynchronous delete operation on the list of data that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是所有数据源视图对象的异步数据删除接口。The method is the asynchronous data deletion interface for all data source view objects. 方法调用方法使用任何`keys`和`oldValues`提供的参数值。The method calls the method using any `keys` and `oldValues` parameter values supplied. `callback`参数是一个委托，数据绑定控件将传递到数据源视图，用于通知数据绑定控件中何时操作已完成。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 该方法使用的参数委托返回受影响的记录和任意数量由引发的异常方法。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the method.

span.span: The supplied is .

summary.span: 获取数据源视图的事件处理程序委托的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of event-handler delegates for the data source view.

value.span: 事件处理程序委托的列表。

span.span: The list of event-handler delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的类型是，它使用线性搜索算法在委托的列表中查找项。This property is of type , which uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates. 使用大量的项时，线性搜索算法是效率低下。A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries. 因此，如果有大型列表，查找具有此属性的条目将会很慢。Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries with this property will be slow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件可以确定是否检索数据源控件支持操作对象使用方法，并检查属性。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by retrieving the object using the method, and checking the property. `keys`参数表示要删除的数据对象或行键。The `keys` parameter represents the object or row keys of the data to delete. 表示关系数据，如数据源控件，`keys`参数是数据库主键的集合。For data sources that represent relational data, such as the control, the `keys` parameter is a collection of database primary keys. 在其他情况下，`keys`参数是名称/值对的集合，用于筛选数据的列表。In other scenarios, the `keys` parameter is a collection of name/value pairs and is used to filter a list of data. 删除所有匹配的名称/值对的数据。Any data matching a name/value pair is deleted. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现将引发异常。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果扩展类中重写方法如果你的类支持从基础数据存储中的删除。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports deletion from the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将扩展的类类可以重写属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#8)]

span.span: The operation is not supported by the .

span.span: The number of items that were inserted into the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件可以确定是否检索数据源控件支持操作对象使用方法，并检查属性。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by retrieving the object using the method, and checking the property. `values`参数是表示数据列或字段和要插入的相应值的一组名称/值对。The `values` parameter is a set of name/value pairs that represents data columns or fields and corresponding values to insert. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现将引发异常。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果扩展类中重写方法如果你的类支持插入到基础数据存储。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports insertion into the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将扩展的类类可以重写属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract System.Collections.IEnumerable ExecuteSelect (System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments);

abstract member ExecuteSelect : System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments -> System.Collections.IEnumerable

param.name: arguments
param.span: 用于请求对数据执行基本数据检索以外的操作的 。

span.span: A that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.

summary.span: 从基础数据存储获取数据列表。

span.span: Gets a list of data from the underlying data storage.

returns.span: 来自基础数据存储的数据的 列表。

span.span: An list of data from the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用以从基础数据存储区检索数据并将其返回为对象。The method is called to retrieve data from the underlying data store and return it as an object. 所有数据源控件都支持从其基础数据存储中检索数据，即使不支持插入和排序等其他操作。All data source controls support data retrieval from their underlying data storage, even if other operations such as insertion and sorting are not supported. 因为数据绑定控件可以在任何时候结果的请求数据的列表事件或方法调用中，必须按需执行数据检索。Because a data-bound control can request a list of data at any time as a result of a event or a method call, the data retrieval must be performed on demand. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的类来扩展类。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class. `CsvDataSourceView`打开的以逗号分隔值 (.csv) 文件，对其行按行进行分析并创建对象和一个对象来在内存中保留的数据。The `CsvDataSourceView` opens a comma-separated value (.csv) file, parses it line by line, and creates a object and a object to hold the data in memory. 最后，如果通过提供的一个应用的排序表达式对象，并对象将作为返回实例。Finally, a sort expression is applied if one is supplied by the object, and the object is returned as an instance. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#6)]

abstract member ExecuteUpdate : System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary -> int override this.ExecuteUpdate : System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary -> int

param.name: keys
param.span: 更新操作要更新的对象或行键的 。

span.span: An of object or row keys to be updated by the update operation.

param.name: values
param.span: 表示数据元素及其新值的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their new values.

param.name: oldValues
param.span: 表示数据元素及其原始值的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.

summary.span: 对 对象所表示的数据列表执行更新操作。

span.span: Performs an update operation on the list of data that the object represents.

returns.span: 已在基础数据存储中更新的项数。

span.span: The number of items that were updated in the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件可以确定是否操作通过使用支持数据源控件方法来检索对象和检查的值属性。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by using the method to retrieve the object and checking the value of the property. `keys`参数表示要更新的数据的对象或行键。The `keys` parameter represents the object or row keys of the data to update. 表示关系数据，如数据源控件，`keys`参数是数据库主键的集合。For data sources that represent relational data, such as the control, the `keys` parameter is a collection of database primary keys. 在其他情况下，`keys`参数是名称/值对的集合，用于筛选数据的列表。In other scenarios, the `keys` parameter is a collection of name/value pairs and is used to filter a list of data. 所有匹配的名称/值对的数据更新中找到的值与`values`参数，这是一组名称/值对表示新值的现有字段或列。Any data matching a name/value pair is updated with the values found in the `values` parameter, which is a set of name/value pairs that represents new values for existing fields or columns. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现将引发异常。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果扩展类中重写方法如果你的类支持基础数据存储中更新数据。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports updating data in the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将扩展的类类可以重写属性和方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#10)]

param.name: values
param.span: 在插入操作期间使用的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs used during an insert operation.

param.name: callback
param.span: 用于在异步操作完成时通知数据绑定控件的 委托。

span.span: A delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.

summary.span: 对 对象所表示的数据列表执行异步插入操作。

span.span: Performs an asynchronous insert operation on the list of data that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是所有数据源视图对象的异步数据插入接口。The method is the asynchronous data insertion interface for all data source view objects. 方法调用方法使用任何`values`提供。The method calls the method using any `values` supplied. `callback`参数是一个委托，数据绑定控件将传递到数据源视图，用于通知数据绑定控件中何时操作已完成。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 该方法使用的参数委托返回受影响的记录和任意数量由引发的异常方法调用。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the method call.

span.span: The supplied is .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnDataSourceViewChanged (EventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceViewChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed

protected: virtual void OnDataSourceViewChanged(EventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnDataSourceViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnDataSourceViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 。

span.span: An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知数据绑定控件已更改基础数据源和控件应重新绑定，并执行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and perform any necessary work. 通常情况下，时数据源视图的属性已更改调用方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: capability
param.span: 与视图支持的功能进行比较的 值之一。

span.span: One of the values that is compared against the capabilities that the view supports.

summary.span: 由 方法调用，用于将 操作所请求的功能与视图所支持的功能进行比较。

span.span: Called by the method to compare the capabilities requested for an operation against those that the view supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源视图使用方法来检查每个请求的数据绑定控件，由表示功能对象传递给方法，并将进行比较的数据的功能，它支持源视图。The method is used by the data source view to examine each of the capabilities requested by a data-bound control, represented by the object passed to the method, and compare it to the capabilities supported by the data source view.

exception.span: 数据源视图不支持指定的数据源功能。

span.span: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是异步的数据修改界面的所有数据源视图对象。The method is the asynchronous data modification interface for all data source view objects. 方法调用方法使用任何`keys`， `values`，和`oldValues`提供的参数值。The method calls the method using any `keys`, `values`, and `oldValues` parameter values supplied. `callback`参数是一个委托，数据绑定控件将传递到数据源视图，用于通知数据绑定控件中何时操作已完成。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 该方法使用的参数委托返回受影响的记录和任意数量由引发的异常调用。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the call.
